name: Ext.ux.field.plugin.clearable
tagline: Text-based form field plugin to provide support for clearing values
body:
# Ext.ux.field.plugin.Clearable
Text-based form field plugin to provide support for clearing values

Demo available [here](https://fiddle.sencha.com/#fiddle/vfd).

![](https://github.com/whiskeredwonder/Ext.ux.field.plugin.Clearable/blob/gh-pages/resources/images/clearable.PNG)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
